name: Darkness Rises (itch)
description:
“Darkness Rises” is a fantasy horror game that takes place in Taloria, a magical realm ruled by the Fae. Kima, a young fairy, has become of age for her coronation as a princess. At the coronation, Kima must announce her choice for her future: life as a warrior or life as a scholar. Her mother and father, King Dorlan and Queen Lani, have hidden Kima’s true heritage from her for her entire life, even in the haunting moments and visions that have plagued her over the last sixteen years. On the eve of her coronation, Kima finds a tome containing dark magic, something forbidden among the Fae. Kima must connect all the clues she finds in the night before making the decision that will change the course of her life forever.

FEATURES:

  • Interactive
  • Multiple Paths
  • Multiple Different Endings
